price: ኑሕንም ከዚያ በፊት (ጌታውን) በጠራ ጊዜ (አስታውስ)፡፡ ለእርሱም (ጥሪውን) ተቀበልነው፡፡ እርሱንም ቤተሰቦቹንም ከከባድ ጭንቅ አዳን፡፡
arabic: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wanūḥan idh nādā min qablu fa-is'tajabnā lahu fanajjaynāhu wa-ahlahu mina al-karbi al-ʿaẓīmi
